text: The Society for Cryobiology is an international scientific society that was founded in 1964. Its objectives are to promote research in low temperature biology, to improve scientific understanding in this field, and to disseminate and aid in the application of this knowledge. The Society also publishes a journal called Cryobiology. ==References== ==External links== *Society for Cryobiology official site Category:Cryobiology
title: Society for Cryobiology
